testId.name: Filter â€“ Empty Included Object Types

tests.requirements:
Requirement II. 11 Each of the bulk inventory mechanisms listed in Requirement II 9 shall support the ability to provide a subset of the inventory known to the target OS. The subset is defined by a filter provided by the requesting OS.
If no included object types are listed, then the entire subtree under the base object instance is returned

testCase.response: Retrieves the entire subtree under Managed Element me1.

postconditions.success: The requesting OS has all the requested inventory information from the target OS.
postconditions.failure: The requesting OS does not have the entire requested inventory information from the target OS.
